entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
